mention.text: the democratic process , especially the peace process
preliminary investigations that merely tell us how things happened
the things normally done at the start of these kinds of investigations
a possible witness to these crimes
the only things we have found
fingerprints that are being studied and shell casings from ak-47 and m-16 rifles
a room or library with video cassettes
this help because in the past cooperation with the authorities has not always been forthcoming
the way to describe these actions
versions that have not been corroborated
